website_summaries.verdict: A good-looking toaster with some nice features, as well as some performance inconsistencies that comes at a relatively high price for a 2-slot model.
pros: Stands out for its retro-like design and bright, shiny red finish that looks great on a kitchen countertop
Build feels solid and well-made, and controls are easy to use
cons: Has the tendency to burn or toast unevenly
Only has 2 slots, which may not be a concern, except it's pricey for its class
Cord is on the short side

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but disfunctional
customer_reviews.text: I've had this toaster for 4 years now. I've only kept it because it was too expensive to just give up on too quickly. So, I tried to work around it's dysfunctional personality. But I've finally decided I just need to get rid of this damn thing. I'm tired of my toast shooting out and flying across the counter. I'm tired of it taking a very long time to produce an unevenly cooked piece of toast, I'm tired of the bagel setting not actually doing anything different than regular setting and I'm tired of a lift function that barely lifts. It gets two stars only because it's beautiful and it does produce toast.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Finally a toaster that toasts evenly!
customer_reviews.text: I have been on the search for the perfect toaster for 8 months. I have purchased about 5-6 toasters. I didn't think it would be that hard to find a toaster that actually toasted evenly. I actually purchased one that toasted one side and not the other. They were all around the same price point as this on. Save your time and just order this toaster. You will be happy you did! The only thing I would improve on this is having the lever go higher so small pieces of toast are easier to get out.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Sexton

customer_reviews.title: Cutest damn toaster ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love my cute retro toaster, particularly the bagel setting which heats the whole thing but only toasts the cut side, just as a bagel should be!
customer_reviews.author: C. Crino

customer_reviews.title: easy to use toaster and I love the design - ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the sharpest looking, easy to use toaster and I love the design - it's the best for the money. I bought a 4 slice that had 4.5 star reviews and returned it... It stopped working.(not of the Dane brand)... This is a deceivingly adorable "beast" of a work horse.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: It's the best toaster I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: It's the best toaster I have ever owned. It looks nice enough to keep out on the counter. It does take a while to toast, but it is VERY consistent. It's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Snoman

customer_reviews.title: Really nice toaster
customer_reviews.text: I've had this toaster for 5 months and I am totally pleased with it. It looks great and does the job perfectly. I particularly like the sturdiness of the construction and the fact that the sides only feel warm instead of too hot to touch that you get with the cheaper stainless models. A little more expensive but definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Old Tech Guy

customer_reviews.title: A toaster  that  makes great  toast ! ?
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful toaster and unlike so many, it even makes great toast! Have been using it for about 2 months now and it is very consistent ! A definite win in my book!
customer_reviews.author: D C Short

customer_reviews.title: Burns bread great, just doesn't toast!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this toaster and found that no matter what setting it burned toast. Down to the lowest setting the toast was eatable but toasted uneven. Returning it for replacement. We will see how toaster #2 works. It is made in China so maybe a quality control issue.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: It does brighten up the kitchen nicely. Miraculously it also makes good toast
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife as she likes the look. It does brighten up the kitchen nicely. Miraculously it also makes good toast. I would like to see it pop up a little higher, but overall it takes bagels and bread easily and toasts them to perfection.
customer_reviews.author: D. Nash

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS! & PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Does everything right. Reliable, and looks gorgeous, too! Easy to use. The perfect toaster. Very highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sine Wave

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT TOASTER HIGH QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: It works amazingly well! all toast comes out cooked even. toaster is metal not plastic
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Nice toaster. Got unexpected compliments on its look
customer_reviews.text: Nice toaster. Got unexpected compliments on its look. After all its just a toaster. Like the control for toast color. Works well on frozen bread or fresh bread
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Darn Good
customer_reviews.text: Solidly built, this toaster makes great toast. It's a little on the slow side but it's a sharp looking unit and has performed well since purchasing it last year.
customer_reviews.author: Lost One

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Toaster not the quality I expected. Does not brown toast evenly, burns toast easily..... For the money, this one does not perform the way it should. Had older delonghi toaster that worked wonderful. This is more on par with $20.00 toaster.......
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: As advertised. Beware though. A setting above two ...
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Beware though. A setting above two will burn your toast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice toaster, but sometimes seems to toast in bagel mode when you are not in bagel mode.
customer_reviews.author: BV Cats

customer_reviews.title: What a great toaster. The finish is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: What a great toaster. The finish is fantastic. Goes great in the kitchen next to my coffee maker which is a similar red. I like the various setting available at the push of a button. If you are looking for a toaster. THIS IS IT.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toaster.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made toaster and looks fantastic on the table. Does a great job toasting. Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: James Mullhaupt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and works very well. My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Roth

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive, does not brown your toast on both sides!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Clay

customer_reviews.title: I liked it and used for a long time
customer_reviews.text: I used to have the same device in Australia but for 4 slices. I didn't see the 4-slice one in the US, and so bought this one. Looks good, works great, lasts forever, nothing more to add.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: I have other de Longhi products that are great, so the low quality of the toaster surprises ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this toaster in November 2014 and it quit working completely in Febrary 2015 - three months later. It is impossible to get take it apart to do any work on it. I have other de Longhi products that are great, so the low quality of the toaster surprises me. Unfortunately, I won't buy de Longhi again.
customer_reviews.author: T. L. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this toaster!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Just received it but two sets of toast and they are the same color 😄!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: it is an excellent size and toasts perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Not only is it neat looking, it is an excellent size and toasts perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the look but it also works very well. Solidly built and attractive too - perfect combination.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer yuyi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great toaster, does what it supposed to, including bagels on one side
customer_reviews.author: ward mickelson

customer_reviews.title: has a nice bagel feature that toasts only one side of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive in the kitchen, has a nice bagel feature that toasts only one side of the bread!! Seems to be of good quality. Love the "retro" look of this unit :)
customer_reviews.author: Albi Villaverde

customer_reviews.title: Stylish toaster
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful toaster! Toasting bread with this every morning is enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: Nico Nico

customer_reviews.title: looks good and does the job
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is very well made, looks good and does the job!
customer_reviews.author: JaD

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The elements don't seem to heat very quickly or uniformly. I thought I'd get my money's worth, but if I had to buy another toaster, I'd probably go for a much cheaper model -- which would probably work just as well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Man

customer_reviews.title: Well-designed retro toaster
customer_reviews.text: Not only has this red toaster become a focal point in the kitchen, but most importantly, it is used daily. The different settings make it very easy and safe to use for toast, bagels, waffles etc.. Because the top part of the metal frame does get quite hot, I am using small bamboo tongues to take the toast out. I would buy this toaster again and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Brandin

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works well
customer_reviews.text: Great looking toaster, and works very well. Toasting isn't always even, but I've never in my life had a toaster that toasted perfectly evenly, so it's not an issue for me. If your bread slices are on the small side, it can be hard to get them out of the toaster. To remedy this I bought these red silicone tongs that work perfectly:  (and they help pull out hot oven racks, too). Overall I'm very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: L. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Toaster does work well and higher settings produces a good crisp brown toast
customer_reviews.text: I got this toaster to go with De’Longhi Nespresso machine and red kitchen theme. Toaster does work well and higher settings produces a good crisp brown toast. Just to mention that toaster body does get hot around the silver edges and all over when in use so you have to be careful when getting the toast out. Another minor irritant is that spring/cancel button does not spring toast all the way out. To clean, taking out tray is not enough, one has to turn it upside down to do a thorough cleaning. Since I got it to match my red kitchen, I am happy with it overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a Toaster...with Some Style
customer_reviews.text: Looks good on the counter as far as toasters go. Only complaint is the analogue dial to control brownness goes from 1 - 7; however, at about 2 1/2 it starts to burn the toast. First world problem.
customer_reviews.author: txtxyeha

customer_reviews.title: It looks beautiful but it honestly does not toast both sides equally
customer_reviews.text: It looks beautiful but it honestly does not toast both sides equally. I tried frozen waffles, toast, and bagels. The bagels barely fit. I guess I have the biggest challenge with the frozen waffles. It's expensive and cheaper products might actually work better. Great study material and pretty but I'm not happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa G.

customer_reviews.title: Lift lever doesn't do much
customer_reviews.text: Despite the description it is NOT easy to remove small pieces. I toasted an english muffin and the lift was not sufficient to allow me to take the muffin out without touching the hot top of the toaster. Returned the toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn A. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Toast is a must have every morning in our family ...
customer_reviews.text: Toast is a must have every morning in our family. This is so well built and more heavy and solid than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Milo Q

customer_reviews.title: It does the job, reasonable cost without unnecessary options.
customer_reviews.text: It toasts, pretty evenly. We picked it because it doesn't have too many bells and whistles, such as a electronic lifting arm which is just another thing that can go wrong. My only gripe is that the unit we received arrived with a scratch in the side.
customer_reviews.author: E. Blakely

customer_reviews.title: There's toast, and, there's toast.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking. I didn't expect it to make better toast because I thought that toast was all the same, but it does make better toast. I also like the reheat option.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome toaster. Very stylish and works well. Controls are easy to read and manipulate.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy P. McNamara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great toaster, mom loved it for X-mas. Going to get one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best toaster ever, and it looks beautiful on your counter.
customer_reviews.author: Goshen

customer_reviews.title: Uneven toasting
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is fine if you like one side almost burnt and the other side barely toasted.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toaster
customer_reviews.text: Finally I have a toaster that not only looks beautiful, but it toasts evenly on both sides. It was well worth the wait. Thank you De'Longhi for a great toaster!!
customer_reviews.author: Denice L. Sims

customer_reviews.title: A keeper.
customer_reviews.text: it's the karmann ghia of toasters! It's red! And it makes very nice toast. A keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Mike F. Aiello

customer_reviews.title: Wow!! Georgeous appliance!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I unpacked it and said: Holy sh*t cake on a shingle. I'm not even sure what that means, but that's how pretty this toaster is. Not sure if I want to use it or worship it. But... Damn! It's georgeous!! Apart from being georgeous, the toaster works well - it has various settings (defrost, bagel, reheat), making it also very useful. It makes me smile every time I use it :-)
customer_reviews.author: Paulina

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but doesnt work.
customer_reviews.text: It didnt work right out of the box. Had to send it back. Did not ask for a new one. Asked for my money back.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: at least it looks good. I'm not sure you can buy a toaster ...
customer_reviews.text: Well, at least it looks good. I'm not sure you can buy a toaster that actually works well anymore. Like every other we've tried, this one toasts unevenly and is not particularly fast. One side will shoot an English muffin out on the counter, sometimes to the side, sometimes to the back. But, it looks great in our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: TBird

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent look/quality for the price. Other toasters are way more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Caterina

customer_reviews.title: Great design ..lasted 3 and 1/2 months
customer_reviews.text: I loved the design online and in person but not the quality. I purchased this toaster in October- it stopped working at the end of January. 65.00 for a toaster that lasted 3 and 1/2 months with light use seems extremely poor quality in a product. I'm deeply disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.author: katheleen

customer_reviews.title: As god as it looks.
customer_reviews.text: An excellent toaster, very well made, fairly priced, my only regret is that I did not buy the four slice toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Queequeg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my adult son, he loves it, said it works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: OMG, this toaster is gorgeous, better than the picture. I mean, it is gorgeous, very retro and very red. It toasts perfectly. I LOVE this toaster!!!
customer_reviews.author: M.Ely

customer_reviews.title: MADE IN CHINA!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would never have paid $63 if I had known this product was MADE IN CHINA!! I thought it was actually made in Italy. Maybe I missed the fact or maybe the LISTING WAS MISLEADING!!!
customer_reviews.author: RedFoxTotem

product_meta.title: De'Longhi CTO2003R 2-Slice Toaster
product_meta.description: CTO2003R Color: Red Features: -Toast bread, bagels, english muffins, frozen waffles and more. -Bagel, defrost, reheat and cancel functions with neon indicators. -Progressive, electronic browning control. -Extra-lift position makes food removal safe and easy. -Removable crumb tray for easy cleaning. -Non-slip feet for stability. Product Type: -Toasters. Primary Material: -Steel. Automatic Shutoff: -Yes. Number of Slices: -2. Cool Touch Exterior: -Yes. Dimensions: Overall Height - Top to Bottom: -8.1". Overall Width - Side to Side: -7.3". Overall Depth - Front to Back: -12.6". Overall Product Weight: -4.4 lbs.
feature_bullets: Extra lift position for easy removal of small slices
Removable crumb tray for easy cleaning
Unique high gloss finish with chromed details
Electronic controls: reheat, defrost, one-sided bagel and cancel

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars90 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
